answers.answer: No need to be depressed sweetheart! Having gestational diabetes isn't that bad. I have it and as long as you're able to control your sugars you and baby will be just fine. Has your doctor mentioned a diabetic class you can take? If so, go. It was extremely helpful for me. And if he doesn't mention it, ask him about it. It's all about controlling your carb intake. I promise it isn't that bad. (:
Thank you soo much! I will I just felt alone and emotional lol
I have it and its not that bad u just have to eat a little healthier and try not to eat breads or sweets. And if u have it really high just eat a cucumber with lemon a day and that makes it go down.

question: I'm scared do any moms to be have this ..I just wanted a normal pregnancy... I just feel depress and emotional...any advice plus help!
title: pregnancy diabetes!!!! help!!
